short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to help recruiters parse inbound applicants from their LinkedIn job posts and easily export them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify your hiring process with the LinkedIn Applicants Exporter Chrome Extension! This essential tool allows recruiters and hiring managers to quickly export a detailed list of applicants from LinkedIn job posts, making data transfer and organization easier than ever.
